Articles.Content: Banned because my eyes are actually bleeding now.
Banned for having blood. Blood! Seriously! Use electrons!
Banned because Pokemon don't bleed; they faint.
Banned for being irrelevant.
Banned for dragon.
Banned for only small boosters.
Banned for being an Explodey Guy.
Banned for having tanks with no actual weaponry.

Banned for having tanks with no actual weaponry.

Banned for calling a MKAV (Mobile Kerbal Assault Vehicle) a tank.
Banned for not realizing that it is in fact, a tank. This is 'murica. (at least where i'm at) Tanks are Tanks.

Banned for being in the same country as I, where tanks are indeed tanks.

(And it did have weapons at one point. Biiiiig missiles that would go supersonic and hit buildings.)
Banned for having a big missile...smaller ones are much more tatical, you pervert
Banned for banning a big missile.
Banned for banning the one who banned my banned big missile.
Banned for not reading the invisible text in my earlier banning post. (i'm assuming you didn't since nothing was said about it)
Oooh, shots fired! Banned for using invisible te- wait. Damn, I just banned myself for hypocrisy. Banned for making me ban myself for hypocrisy.
Banned for saying i made you ban yourself for hypocrisy. I did no such thing.
banned for trying to reason with someone who was being hypocritical
banned for not being hypocritical
Banned for being in the rock.
Banned bacause maybe he meant Rockville?
Banned for having a weapon in your avatar.

banned for having a flaming kerbal....poor dude.

(pamplemousse its the rock is the citadel of the dark angels heres a linky for you)

Hello,

Whilst I think this is reprehensible and I am not sure if that word even applies here nor am I sure what it means...banning people for no reason is not nice...and we have over 700 people banning people...wow...

My only problem is I should be banned for forgetting what my avatar looks like cause I been playing KSP alot lately...now if someone bans me for being too serious, that I can go with...so go ahead and make my day and may the golden kraken of, well we really dont know whare the kraken comes from, be relentless in your space travels...harr harr...

Now as to the previous poster I cant ban him cause I already forgot what he wrote...maybe it was a 'flame'...I think it was a flamer - ya - no wait - that was the one before...you can ban me for being fergetful, having alot of typos, hmmm...wait nah dont ban me if you do i will have a cry...

Wait - I got one - ban me cause I type too much ! Wait - even better did I forget one?

Cdr Zeta

Banned because tl;dr

Is it your first time in a forum game? :3
